lines.text: You on holiday too, Mr Cooper?
No, I'm afraid not, I'm actually running away.
Love, Mr Rigby, you must have been in love. If it doesn't work out you either kill yourself or you run away to forget. And its not in my religion to try suicide.
Sometimes living can be just as painful.
One minute he's screaming about someone trying to kill him. Next he clams up.
I think its better for you if I get out now.
Mr Rigby, this is a BMW.
Where did you learn to drive like that?
I felt sorry for the little guy but he was wrong about one thing. I was in, far too deep to back out. Whether I wanted to or not I had to see it through to the end.
